item.title: Albuquerque Hot Air Balloon Ride at Sunrise
item.description: Watch daylight appear above the Rio Grand Valley during a sunrise hot air balloon ride from Albuquerque, and see the first rays illuminate the rugged Sandia Mountains. Take in stunning aerial views and dip low enough to skim the Rio Grande, then rise back up above the desert landscape. Touch town after a 1-hour flight, and begin the day with sparkling wine before returning to your launch site.

image.alt: Albuquerque Hot Air Balloon Ride at Sunrise

item.title: The Ghost Tour of Old Town - New Mexico's oldest Ghost Walk - Since 2001
item.description: Take a haunted tour of Old Town Albuquerque and learn about the many ghosts who have made the square home. Legends, folklore, ghost stories, and history come to life as you depart on an intriguing excursion through 313 years of haunted history. Historic buildings and dark alleys conceal long-forgotten secrets of battles, murders, hangings, hidden cemeteries, and more.

image.alt: The Ghost Tour of Old Town - New Mexico's oldest Ghost Walk - Since 2001

item.title: Albuquerque Hot Air Balloon Rides at Sunrise
item.description: Albuquerque is world renowned for its hot air balloon festival. Most visitors only watch balloons from the ground but this tour offers the chance to soar into the air yourself. Watch the sun rise as you fly over the Sandia Mountains and toast the experience with a glass of bubbly.

image.alt: Albuquerque Hot Air Balloon Rides at Sunrise

item.title: 12pm - Public High Noon History, Legends & Lore Tour - Guided Old Town Stroll
item.description: Rather than wandering around alone, explore Albuquerque's Old Town in the company of someone who knows it best and can provide context. This small-group walking tour introduces you to the legends, lore and colorful characters of this historically rich neighborhood while taking you to all the most important landmarks.

image.alt: 12pm - Public High Noon History, Legends & Lore Tour - Guided Old Town Stroll

item.title: Turquoise Museum Visit
item.description: Learn all about turquoise during your time in the American Southwest with a visit to the Turquoise Museum in Albuquerque. Located in a modern 'castle' that is as interesting as the exhibits, the Turquoise Museum features a vast collection of turquoise jewelry and other pieces such as antique furniture. which you can explore on a self-guided tour.

image.alt: Turquoise Museum Visit

item.title: Sunrise Hot Air Balloon Tour in New Mexico
item.description:
Choosing our launch sights daily makes it a lot more likely your flight is successful. Ballooning is dependent upon the weather and having such a large radius we fly in gives us a much higher likelihood of having a slow soft landing.
We offer private flights as well as group flights. We can accommodate almost any requests and we would be happy to do so.

image.alt: Sunrise Hot Air Balloon Tour in New Mexico

item.title: Guided Bicycle Nature Tour of Albuquerque - Daily
item.description: See parts of Albuquerque that tour buses cannot reach, and cover more ground than is possible on foot. This bicycle tour introduces you to the nature and culture of Albuquerque. You'll explore some of the city’s best scenery, living cultures and unique eco-systems, and have a chance to dip your toes into the city's celebrated lifeline, the Rio Grande.

image.alt: Guided Bicycle Nature Tour of Albuquerque - Daily

item.title: Private Hot Air Balloon Flights with Elevated New Mexico
item.description: Albuquerque is famed for its hot air balloon festival, so there's no better place to take to the skies. Rather than crowding into a basket with strangers, enjoy a personalized experience with this private hot air balloon flight. You'll enjoy sunrise views as you float through the air and celebrate your experience with an included toast upon landing,

image.alt: Private Hot Air Balloon Flights with Elevated New Mexico

item.title: Old Town Albuquerque Ghost Tour
item.description:
Step back in time and immerse yourself in the chilling tales of Albuquerque's haunted past as you embark on this thrilling walking ghost tour. From the eerie Old Town Visitor Center to the ghostly Church Street Cafe, each location holds a dark history waiting to be uncovered.
As you traverse through the haunted streets of Albuquerque, you will feel the hair on the back of your neck stand on end as you hear about the gruesome deaths, illicit activities, and financial disasters that have left a mark on this haunted city.
Discover the enchanting allure of this lesser-known gem as you traverse a mile-long path through Albuquerque's historic and haunted neighborhoods. Spend your evening on grounds alive with ghostly tales and historic intrigue, where every step brings you closer to the whispers of the past.
*Note: Tour stops listed are subject to change based on availability and season.

image.alt: Old Town Albuquerque Ghost Tour

item.title: Albuquerque Hot Air Balloon Ride at Sunset
item.description: Watch sunset ignite the Rio Grande Valley on a hot air balloon ride from Albuquerque, and see the evening light transform the Sandia Mountains and desert landscape. Enjoy commentary from your pilot throughout the flight, and spot the region’s landmarks as you soar above the rugged terrain; dip low to skim the Rio Grande and capture unforgettable, aerial images of New Mexico’s largest city. Touch back down after a 1-hour flight, then linger over sparkling wine and snacks before returning to your launch site.

image.alt: Albuquerque Hot Air Balloon Ride at Sunset

item.title: PRIVATE History, Legends and Lore Guided Old Town Stroll - 10am or 2pm
item.description: If you’re looking to get an introduction to Albuquerque through its history, but don’t want to join a large group tour, try booking this Albuquerque Old Town Private History Tour. A guide tells the city’s history through lore and legends as you stroll the streets and take in sights of Albuquerque’s Old Town highlights. Plus, since this is a private tour, it can be altered to suit your needs and wants.

image.alt: PRIVATE History, Legends and Lore Guided Old Town Stroll - 10am or 2pm

item.title: 6pm Private Ghost Tour of Old Town Albuquerque
item.description: Experience Albuquerque's oldest and most famous Ghost Walk, featured on the Travel Channel, Weird Travels, Breaking Bad, In Plain Sight, and The Dead Files. This fun and informative stroll takes you through Old Town's historic streets to hear the eyewitness accounts of hauntings and spirits. Our masterful storytellers give a family-friendly mix of chills and chuckles for an entertaining, thrilling, and memorable time in Albuquerque's historic center.

image.alt: 6pm Private Ghost Tour of Old Town Albuquerque

item.title: The Dinner Detective Murder Mystery Dinner Show - Albuquerque, NM
item.description: Combine dinner with entertainment and enjoy an evening in Albuquerque unlike any other by attending America's largest interactive murder mystery comedy dinner show. While dining on a delicious four-course meal you'll play the part of a sleuth by attempting to solve a crime and rein in the prime suspects who are hiding in plain sight.

image.alt: The Dinner Detective Murder Mystery Dinner Show - Albuquerque, NM

item.title: 8pm Private Ghost Tour of Old Town Albuquerque
item.description:
Legends, folklore, ghost stories and history come to life as you depart on an intriguing excursion through 318 years of haunted history. Old Town is the birthplace of Albuquerque, founded in 1706. For more than three centuries people have lived, and died, around the Plaza. Historic buildings conceal the long-forgotten secrets of lost loves, Civil War battles, murders, hangings - even hidden cemeteries.
EVERYONE LOVES A GOOD OLD-FASHIONED GHOST STORY!
Professional Tour Guides escort you on a 105-minute, lantern-lit adventure of the scenic Old Town Albuquerque area. Search for lost souls of early residents, Civil War phantoms, spooks, specters, and over a dozen ghosts who have made Old Town their eternal home. Learn history and basics of Ghost Hunting as you hear the chilling stories of actual events.
Old Town is one of the most actively haunted locations in North America. Tour is is rated “PG” for some real historical information that may be disturbing to younger/sensitive guests.

image.alt: 8pm Private Ghost Tour of Old Town Albuquerque

item.title: New Mexico Flavors Tour Of Old Town Albuquerque
item.description: If you’re looking to explore the food of New Mexico while in Albuquerque, this Albuquerque Old Town Food Tour is a great pick. Book now and reserve your spot on this fun tour that passes San Felipe de Neri Church and Capilla de Nuestra Senora de Guadalupe on the way to eateries. Enjoy food and alcoholic beverages as your guide tells you about the history, culture, and food of the area.

image.alt: New Mexico Flavors Tour Of Old Town Albuquerque

item.title: Historic Old Town Albuquerque smart phone App/Audio Walking Tour
item.description:
See Albuquerque’s historic spots and discover it’s history and legends, at your own pace, anytime, on this smart phone guided (GPS/APP) walking tour.
On the tour you will see the old patio market, the San Felipe de Neri Church, a hidden chapel, the old trading post, the candy shop that dishes out Heisenberg blue the prop used on Breaking Bad, the Old Town Square, the outdoor conquistador’s statures, the hidden courtyard, and so much more.
And I’ll share with you the history of Albuquerque, the native peoples, the legends and lore of rattle snakes and turquoise, the conquistadores, the settlers who founded the city, history of trade, and so much more.
Go at your own pace and schedule. Feel free to pause the tour anytime to explore. The tour never expires.

image.alt: Historic Old Town Albuquerque smart phone App/Audio Walking Tour

item.title: 4pm Private Ghost Tour of Old Town Albuquerque
item.description: Discover Albuquerque’s historical heart when you explore its Old Town—and learn about the city’s history of haunted encounters and other supernatural events—on this private walking tour. Meet your guide in the late afternoon and set off to discover centuries-old landmarks aplenty. As you go, your guide will share ghost stories from the city’s long history, designed to spook and amuse you in equal measure.

image.alt: 4pm Private Ghost Tour of Old Town Albuquerque

item.title: Private Hot Air Balloon Rides in Albuquerque
item.description: It isn't uncommon for people to fly just one time in a hot air balloon. Why not make it an exclusive experience for a memorable, peaceful and intimate flight? This makes a perfect gift for all sorts of celebrations and milestones such as anniversaries, birthdays and engagements. Expect a beautiful float along the Rio Grande river with views of wildlife and the Bosque (cottonwood forest) as well as a majestic sunrise over the Sandia Mountains.

image.alt: Private Hot Air Balloon Rides in Albuquerque

item.title: Albuquerque Old Town Art Tour with Wine & Museum Admission
item.description: Join the only tour of Albuquerque's Old Town that highlights its intriguing history and unique art galleries. The area has plenty of both! Your local guide has extensive knowledge of the arts to provide an in-depth feel for the Albuquerque scene. You’ll also get a good dose of the area’s history and heritage. Meet local artists, visit the Albuquerque Museum, and enjoy a glass of local wine in the company of like-minded people.

image.alt: Albuquerque Old Town Art Tour with Wine & Museum Admission

item.title: Quirky Burque Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Our very unique, immersive adventures are the only ones of their kind. We, unlike other companies, provide your very own remote, interactive, live host to assist and encourage you along through your phone. We are an Austin, TX-based global custom event design company offering scavenger hunts and other events in 300+ cities in North America and beyond. Our specially hand-crafted adventures are equal parts tour, creative challenge, detective hunt, and social experiment!
Guests get to discover in an alternate reality our favorite hidden gems off the beaten trail and creatively interpret fun art, history, and culture clues - for points! They get to enjoy fame and glory while appearing on our website’s international leaderboard, no matter what their score. They get to essentially race other teams in other cities, even if they don’t have competitors who have signed up in their city that day. Get ready to discover unusual oddities, laugh out loud, and make the experience your own!

image.alt: Quirky Burque Scavenger Hunt

item.title: Albuquerque’s Timeless Wonders: From Plazas to Museums
item.description: Step into the vibrant tapestry of Albuquerque on a journey that seamlessly weaves history, nature, and art. Start at Plaza Don Luis, feeling the pulse of the city’s rich Spanish legacy. Journey alongside the iconic Rio Grande, uncovering the hidden tales that nestle on its banks. Marvel at the poignant “La Jornada” sculptures, paying homage to the determination of early settlers. Let the Albuquerque Museum captivate you with stories from bygone eras and artistic masterpieces. Finally, find solace and reflection at the serene Chapel of Our Lady of Guadalupe. Led by our knowledgeable guides, this tour promises an enriching experience, placing you, the traveler, at the heart of Albuquerque’s narrative.

image.alt: Albuquerque’s Timeless Wonders: From Plazas to Museums

item.title: Virtual History, Legends and Lore Old Town Stroll of Albuquerque
item.description:
The Virtual History, Legends & Lore Old Town Stroll provides a richer and deeper look into many more locations than can be experienced on our Daily 90-minute Guided Walking Tours.
See how the historic Old Town area has developed and changed since 1706. Compare modern day photos with historic images to gain a feeling of what life in the Wild West was really like. Our mission is to share the past history and the current vitality of this beloved and most visited Albuquerque destination.
AbqTours has provided memorable experiences for over 200,000 Guests since April 2001 and is rated 5-Stars on TripAdvisor. Featured on some of your favorite shows including Weird Travels, The Dead Files, In Plain Sight, Coast to Coast Radio and numerous other News, Radio and Print media. With 20 years’ of Guiding Tours, we KNOW Old Town!

image.alt: Virtual History, Legends and Lore Old Town Stroll of Albuquerque

item.title: Albuquerque Scavenger Hunt Adventure
item.description: Channel your inner detective for a scavenger hunt adventure through Old Town Albuquerque! Using any smartphone as a virtual guide, solve riddles and challenges to find a trail of clues scattered throughout the city. Work at your own pace, and track your progress. Great for families, small groups and fans of *The Amazing Race*.

image.alt: Albuquerque Scavenger Hunt Adventure

item.title: Private Arrival Transfer from Albuquerque Airport (ABQ)
item.description: This private transfer service makes getting you and your crew from the Albuquerque Airport to your area lodging simple and stress-free. Your driver picking you up at arrivals, you’ll drop off your luggage and hop into your ride. From there, simply sit back and relax until you’re dropped off at the door of your lodging, ready for the next leg of your New Mexico adventure.

image.alt: Private Arrival Transfer from Albuquerque Airport (ABQ)
